Articles.Content:
Hey guys,

So glad that i found your forum, great job and the community is really friendly! Apologies if this is in the wrong category to post this in but i was after a little bit of help from you guys.

I have just started a new forum myself and would like to think there is something for everyone there. Hope some of you may have the time to join me and the rest of the gang. To be honest, your forum was the inspiration for me starting That Forum Site in the first place!

If you don't have the time to join in on That Forum Site then it's no biggy, just thought i would be cheeky and ask because i like the style of your forums and you have fantastic loyal members here

Enough plugging now, I look forward to participating in your vibrant and energetic community, as i say, truely inspirational work!

Hmm...So it's a forum for anything and everything? Interesting. Welcome to KSP btw! Happy launching!

(I beat skunkmonkey...har har)

I have to admit, this does look borderline spammy. We'll let it pass for now since the site he linked doesn't appear to be a commercial site trying to sell some product.

Arrr!

Capt'n Skunky

If it's a forum for anything and everything...

Get a huge team of people together to moderate, cause there'll be all sorts of trouble. Just look at 4chan.
